name: NEET-UG 2 Year Integrated Program
highlight: Ideal for dedicated Class 10 pass-outs targeting AIIMS & top Govt. medical colleges.
features: Concept-first teaching with NCERT line-by-line coverage.
Daily practice problems (DPPs) and weekly part tests.
Full syllabus NEET pattern tests with detailed analytics.
Regular PTMs and parent dashboards for progress tracking.

name: NEET-UG 1 Year Target Batch
highlight: Focused revision batch for serious aspirants with strong basics.
features: Fast-track concept recap and problem practice.
Grand tests simulating NEET exam hall environment.
Question discussion marathons and doubt counters.
Personalized improvement plans based on test performance.

name: JEE (Main + Advanced) 2 Year Program
highlight: Balanced JEE Main and Advanced preparation with boards integration.
features: Strong conceptual focus in Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics.
Daily practice sheets with mixed-level problems.
Topic-wise & full-syllabus JEE mock tests.
Mentor-guided attempt planning for Main & Advanced.

name: GBPUAT / ICAR / Veterinary Sciences
highlight: Specialised content, test series and mentoring for agriculture & veterinary entrances.
features: Exam-specific theory and objective question practice.
Dedicated test series with GBPUAT & ICAR pattern.
Doubt-solving sessions with domain experts.
Guidance for college and branch selection.

name: School Excellence Program (Classes 9-10)
highlight: Concept clarity and high board scores with Olympiad support.
features: NCERT-aligned coverage for Maths & Science.
Regular class tests and unit-wise worksheets.
Olympiad & NTSE level question exposure.
Study habit building with daily homework tracking.

name: Integrated Board + Entrance (Classes 11-12)
highlight: Manage both boards and entrance syllabi without burnout.
features: Separate board-style and entrance-style practice.
Sample paper discussions and answer writing sessions.
Doubt counters before school exams.
Mentoring on balancing school, coaching and self-study.

name: Hybrid Mentorship & Online Support
highlight: Perfect for students who cannot attend all physical classes in Haldwani.
features: Live doubt sessions and strategy calls.
Access to recorded concept capsules.
Online test series with analytics dashboard.
Periodic in-centre revision camps (optional).
